mapper.sql: RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, RECONCILIATION_ID, CHECK_STATUS, CHECK_RESULT, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_NUMBER, CAR_VIN, CAR_BRAND_ID, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_MODEL_ID, QUOTATION_ID, FREIGHT_RATE, ACTUAL_FREIGHT_RATE, HEDGE_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_REASON, SEND_CITY_ID, RECV_CITY_ID, SEND_UNIT_ID, RECV_UNIT_ID, CORP_ID, FLAG

self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_ID, self.CHECK_STATUS, self.CHECK_RESULT, self.ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, self.ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER, self.OUTSOURCING_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, self.OUTSOURCING_ORDER_NUMBER, self.CAR_VIN, self.CAR_BRAND_ID, self.CAR_TYPE_ID, self.CAR_MODEL_ID, self.QUOTATION_ID, self.FREIGHT_RATE, self.ACTUAL_FREIGHT_RATE, self.HEDGE_AMOUNT, self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, self.DEDUCTION_REASON, self.SEND_CITY_ID, self.RECV_CITY_ID, self.SEND_UNIT_ID, self.RECV_UNIT_ID, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, carBrand.BRAND_NAME as refCarBrandName, carType.CAR_TYPE_NAME as refCarTypeName, carModel.CAR_NAME as refCarModelName, sendCity.CITY_NAME as refSendCityName, recvCity.CITY_NAME as refRecvCityName, sendUnit.UNIT_NAME as refSendUnitName, recvUnit.UNIT_NAME as refRecvUnitName, corp.CORP_NAME as refCorpName

where self.DEL = 0 and self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId} and self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and self.CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus} and self.CHECK_RESULT = #{checkResult} and self.ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId} and self.ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER = #{originalOrderNumber} and self.OUTSOURCING_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{outsourcingOrderDetailId} and self.OUTSOURCING_ORDER_NUMBER = #{outsourcingOrderNumber} and self.CAR_VIN = #{carVin} and self.CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId} and self.CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId} and self.CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId} and self.QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId} and self.FREIGHT_RATE = #{freightRate} and self.ACTUAL_FREIGHT_RATE = #{actualFreightRate} and self.HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount} and self.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount} and self.DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason} and self.SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId} and self.RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId} and self.SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId} and self.RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.select: select from fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join bd_city sendCity on self.SEND_CITY_ID = sendCity.CITY_ID left join bd_city recvCity on self.RECV_CITY_ID = recvCity.CITY_ID left join bd_unit sendUnit on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = sendUnit.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit recvUnit on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = recvUnit.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update: update fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECK_RESULT = #{checkResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER = #{originalOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{outsourcingOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_NUMBER = #{outsourcingOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FREIGHT_RATE = #{freightRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_FREIGHT_RATE = #{actualFreightRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail set RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECK_RESULT = #{checkResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER = #{originalOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{outsourcingOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OUTSOURCING_ORDER_NUMBER = #{outsourcingOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_BRAND_ID = #{carBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_MODEL_ID = #{carModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QUOTATION_ID = #{quotationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FREIGHT_RATE = #{freightRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_FREIGHT_RATE = #{actualFreightRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEDGE_AMOUNT = #{hedgeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_AMOUNT = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_UNIT_ID = #{sendUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_UNIT_ID = #{recvUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail self left join bd_brand carBrand on self.CAR_BRAND_ID = carBrand.BRAND_ID left join bd_car_type carType on self.CAR_TYPE_ID = carType.CAR_TYPE_ID left join bd_car carModel on self.CAR_MODEL_ID = carModel.CAR_ID left join bd_city sendCity on self.SEND_CITY_ID = sendCity.CITY_ID left join bd_city recvCity on self.RECV_CITY_ID = recvCity.CITY_ID left join bd_unit sendUnit on self.SEND_UNIT_ID = sendUnit.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit recvUnit on self.RECV_UNIT_ID = recvUnit.UNIT_ID left join sys_corp corp on self.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT FROM fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail WHERE RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} AND FLAG = 0 AND DEL = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE fs_outsourcing_reconciliation_detail SET DEL = 1 WHERE RECONCILIATION_DETAIL_ID = #{reconciliationDetailId}
